projects.name: Oscilloscope with ATmega 2560
projects.summary: A guide to building an oscilloscope with ATmega2560 that makes use of gnuplot for graph printing.

projects.name: SQLi ML defense
projects.summary: An application for inband SQL injection attacks, allowing attackers to inject SQL commands via user input using methods like Tautology, End-of-line comment, and Piggybacked query. A Machine Learning detection system is integrated to identify and block SQLi attempts in real-time by analyzing query patterns.
